name: The Great Advanture of Raka
description:
A new day, a new life appears in the world. not a human but only a plant. This plant feels bored in this place because this place has a bad environment. He listens to stories from the big old tree that there are good places to live. After hearing the stories he decides to go to the place told by the big old tree. After he decided to go, he realized the hurdles he had to pass to get to that place. He went through many seasons and saw many plants. He went through many obstacles to get to the place said by a big tree. after many obstacles passed finally found the place that was told and finally he lived peacefully there.

This project is from Global Game Jam 2023 Tangerang. For the original version, you may go here:   GGJ 2023 Version
